languages.text: "Если кто и знает, где сейчас мои братья по стае, то это он. Но о таких вещах негоже говорить при посторонних, потому на военном совете я счел за лучшее хранить молчание".
"If anyone knows where my pack brothers are now, he does. But it is not right to speak of such things within others' hearing — that is why I thought it better to keep silent at the war council."
languages.original_text: "Если кто и знает, где сейчас мои братья по стае, то это он. Но о таких вещах негоже говорить при посторонних, потому на военном совете я счел за лучшее хранить молчание".

languages.text: «Si alguien sabe dónde están mis hermanos de jauría ahora mismo es él. Pero no es correcto hablar de semejantes temas delante de otras personas. Por eso guardé silencio durante el consejo de guerra».
languages.original_text: "If anyone knows where my pack brothers are now, he does. But it is not right to speak of such things within others' hearing — that is why I thought it better to keep silent at the war council."

traits.locale_text: «Si alguien sabe dónde están mis hermanos de jauría ahora mismo es él. Pero no es correcto hablar de semejantes temas delante de otras personas. Por eso guardé silencio durante el consejo de guerra».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “如果有谁知道我的狼群在什么地方，那个人肯定是索巴德。不过，这些事情最好别在其他人耳边说，所以我认为在战争议会上保持沉默比较好。”
languages.original_text: "If anyone knows where my pack brothers are now, he does. But it is not right to speak of such things within others' hearing — that is why I thought it better to keep silent at the war council."

traits.locale_text: “如果有谁知道我的狼群在什么地方，那个人肯定是索巴德。不过，这些事情最好别在其他人耳边说，所以我认为在战争议会上保持沉默比较好。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「俺の群れが今どこにいるかを知ってる奴がいるとしたら、それはあいつだ。だが、こういったことは他の者たちが聞いている場で話すことではない。だから軍事委員会では口をつぐんだ方がいいと判断したんだ」
languages.original_text: "If anyone knows where my pack brothers are now, he does. But it is not right to speak of such things within others' hearing — that is why I thought it better to keep silent at the war council."

traits.locale_text: 「俺の群れが今どこにいるかを知ってる奴がいるとしたら、それはあいつだ。だが、こういったことは他の者たちが聞いている場で話すことではない。だから軍事委員会では口をつぐんだ方がいいと判断したんだ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Si quelqu'un sait où trouver mes frères de meute, c'est bien lui. Mais ce sont des choses qu'il vaut mieux ne pas aborder devant témoins, raison pour laquelle j'ai préféré me taire lors du conseil de guerre. »
languages.original_text: "If anyone knows where my pack brothers are now, he does. But it is not right to speak of such things within others' hearing — that is why I thought it better to keep silent at the war council."

traits.locale_text: « Si quelqu'un sait où trouver mes frères de meute, c'est bien lui. Mais ce sont des choses qu'il vaut mieux ne pas aborder devant témoins, raison pour laquelle j'ai préféré me taire lors du conseil de guerre. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Wenn jemand weiß, wo meine Rudelbrüder nun sind, dann er. Doch es ist nicht richtig, in Hörweite anderer von solchen Dingen zu sprechen. Darum hielt ich es für besser, beim Kriegsrat zu schweigen."
languages.original_text: "If anyone knows where my pack brothers are now, he does. But it is not right to speak of such things within others' hearing — that is why I thought it better to keep silent at the war council."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn jemand weiß, wo meine Rudelbrüder nun sind, dann er. Doch es ist nicht richtig, in Hörweite anderer von solchen Dingen zu sprechen. Darum hielt ich es für besser, beim Kriegsrat zu schweigen."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "If anyone knows where my pack brothers are now, he does. But it is not right to speak of such things within others' hearing — that is why I thought it better to keep silent at the war council."

languages.text: "Sürü kardeşlerimin şu an nerede olduğunu bilen birisi varsa odur. Fakat böyle konular başkalarının yanında konuşulmaz. Savaş konseyinde ağzımı açmamamın da sebebi buydu."
languages.original_text: "If anyone knows where my pack brothers are now, he does. But it is not right to speak of such things within others' hearing — that is why I thought it better to keep silent at the war council."

traits.locale_text: "Sürü kardeşlerimin şu an nerede olduğunu bilen biri varsa odur. Fakat böyle konular başkalarının yanında konuşulmaz. Savaş konseyinde ağzımı açmamamın da sebebi buydu."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
